type: REPAIR AND OVERHAUL OF MATERIAL HANDLING EQUIPMENT (MHE)
short_summary: The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement for Repair and Overhaul (R&O), Field Service Representatives (FSR) and Technical Support to perform inspection, repair, and to maintain Material Handling Equipment (MHE) and its components. The work will be carried out for a period of three (3) years from the effective date of the contract with an option to extend for two (2) additional periods of one (1) year. The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

full_summary:
**Notice of Proposed Procurement - Repair and Overhaul of Material Handling Equipment (MHE)**

**Public Procurement Notice Reference:**

*W8486-228609/B*

**Publication Date:**

*July 11, 2023*

**Closing Date:**

*July 31, 2023 14:00:00 (EST)*

**Procurement Category:**

*SRVTGD*

**Procurement Method:**

* Competitive - Open bidding*

**Notice Type:**

*Request for Proposal*

**Selection Criteria:**

* Lowest Price*

**Overview:**

The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement for the repair and overhaul of Material Handling Equipment (MHE) and its components. The services will be carried out in accordance with Annex A – Statement of Work, dated January 17, 2023, and Annex B – Logistics Statement of Work.

**Scope of Work:**

The work will include inspection, repair, and maintenance of MHE and its components for a period of three (3) years from the effective date of the contract, with an option to extend for two (2) additional periods of one (1) year.

**Submission Requirements:**

* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French).
* Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation process within 15 working days from receipt of the results.
* Bids must be submitted via email only to: *DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca*

**Trade Agreements:**

* Please refer to Tender Description or Tender Documents for details.

**Regions of Opportunity:**

* Worldwide

**Regions of Delivery:**

* Canada

**Contracting Entity Information:**

* Name: Hector Vargas
* Address: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2, Canada

**Contact Information:**

* Name: Hector Vargas
* Email: *HECTOR.VARGAS@forces.gc.ca*
* Phone: (000) 000-0000

**Attachments:**

* W8486-228609_RO_Militarized_MHE_Fleet_626-Task-Authorization-Annex-G (English)
* W8486-228609_B_RO_Militarized_MHE_Fleet_RFP (English)
* W8486-228609_RO_Militarized_MHE_Fleet_626-Task-Authorization
